about_the_game:
***This game is in early development. Still in testing. ***
Embark on a journey through the enchanting world of "Frop: Chronicles of the Forged Path," a fantasy adventure that merges the art of magic and blacksmithing in a tale of discovery, legacy, and redemption. In this third-person adventure, players take on the role of a young frog determined to uncover the fate of his parents and restore their legacy. Travel through diverse biomes, from vibrant forests to icy mountains, each brimming with secrets, treasures, and dangers. As you delve into ancient dungeons, you'll solve intricate puzzles, confront formidable mobs, and face off against bosses.

Key Features:
Expansive World: Explore a richly detailed world filled with varied biomes and dungeons, each offering unique challenges and secrets to uncover.

Leveling and Spells: Progress through the game to level up your character, unlocking powerful spells and abilities that will aid you in your quest.

Blacksmithing: Discover ancient blacksmithing lore to obtain special armor and weapons, enhancing your abilities and offering new strategies for combat and exploration.

Treasures and Lore: Find hidden treasure chests and Easter eggs scattered throughout the world, each providing insights into the game's lore and history, enriching the narrative and your connection to the world.

Puzzles and Challenges: Engage in challenging puzzles within dungeons, testing your wit and rewarding you with key items and treasures critical for your journey.

Boss Battles: Face off against formidable bosses, each guarding the key items necessary to complete the game and further the story.

Sidequests: Embark on numerous sidequests that enrich the game's world, offering additional insights into the characters and lore of "Frop: Chronicles of the Forged Path."

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

dejus.descriptors: The content is not harmful to children of any age. It may contain a little very low impact content, such as cartoon violence.

esrb.descriptors:
Fantasy Violence
Content is generally suitable for ages 10 and up. May contain more cartoon, fantasy or mild violence, mild language and/or minimal suggestive themes.

kgrb.descriptors: Titles rated ALL have content that may be suitable for all ages.

oflc.descriptors:
The content is mild in impact.

The impact of PG (Parental Guidance) classified computer games should be no higher than mild, but they may contain content that children find confusing or upsetting and may require the guidance of parents and guardians. They may, for example, contain classifiable elements such as language and themes that are mild in impact. It is not recommended for viewing or playing by persons under 15 without guidance from parents or guardians.

pegi.descriptors: Any app that would normally be rated at 3 but contains some scenes or sounds that can possibly be frightening for children may be considered suitable in this category. There can only be very mild violence in a PEGI 7 app, like implied violence or non-detailed, non-realistic violence.

usk.descriptors: Apps in this category can contain elements that may not be appropriate for pre-school children. They may contain occasional scary moments, a low accumulation of mild cursing or subtle erotic innuendo. If violent imageries are present they remain abstract and are not decisive for the overall product. Games in this age category can still be categorized as family-friendly but involve more exciting and competitive aspects.

short_description: A fantasy action-adventure game where players forge their path, combining spellcasting, blacksmithing, and exploration. Solve puzzles, defeat bosses, and uncover your legacy in a world of magic.
